doc.field: Henry Draper: Reprints. "On Diffraction Spectrum Photography," reprinted from the American Journal of Science and Arts, vol. VI, Dec. 1873; "The Total Solar Eclipse of July 29, 1878," reprinted from the Journal of the Franklin Institute for Oct. 1878 (2 copies); and "Researches on Astronomical Spectrum"
